ping.name: ping
ping.description: Ping the bot to check if it is alive !

restrictions.description: Number of restrictions added per round

user.description: User to invite to the session

user.name: user
user.description: User to remove from the session

users.name: users
users.description: List the current users of a session

ephemeral.name: ephemeral
ephemeral.description: Show the list to all users in a channel (default: True)

start.name: start
start.description: Start a session, no users can be added

end.name: end
end.description: Ends a session, will store and archive the results

end.name: end
end.description: Mark the current round as a win

high_scores.name: high_scores
high_scores.description: Show best results and relevant data

generic.notinsession: You're not in a session in this guild.

create.insession:
You're already in an active session on this guild.
-# session id: `{sessionid}`

createdembed.title: New session created
createdembed.content:
You can now finish configure it using the following commands:
* `/session handle invite` to add other discord users to the session
* `/session handle remove` to remove discord users from the session
* `/session handle users` to display current users in the session

Invited users can also use the following commands:
* `/session round start`
* `/session round end` close a round and inform the outcome
* `/session round restrictions` list the current restrictions on the session

inviteuser.notlead: You're not leading a session in this guild, you can not invite people to it.
inviteuser.userinsession: User {username} is already in a session on this guild, he can not be invited to this one.

removeuser.notleading: You're not leading a session in this guild, you can not remove people from one.
removeuser.usernotinsession: User {username} is not in your session.
removeuser.userremoved: User {username} was removed from your session.

embed.title: Session members

startsession.unabletogenerate: Unable to generate restrictions for first round:

endsession.activeround: You have an active round, use `/session round end` to determine the final outcome of it.

embed.title: Session has ended

endround.invalidghost: {ghost} is invalid, select one from the list.
endround.noactiveround: You don't have an active round, use `/session round start` to start a new round.

embed.title: Round finished
embed.description:
Round resulted in a {state}.
Ghost type: {ghost}
embed.footer: To start a new round use /round start

newround.activeround: You have an active round, use `/session round end` to determine the final outcome of it.
newround.unabletogenerate: Unable to generate restrictions for round:

generic_responses.not_in_guild: This command only works in a server.

no_flashlights.name: No Flashlights
no_flashlights.description: Investigation must be done in the dark or with room lights.

broken_sprint.name: Old age
broken_sprint.description: Sprinting was in your youth, you can no longer do it.

radio_silence.name: Radio Silence
radio_silence.description: You've forgotten to charge your radios, you need to be together to talk.

single_trip.name: Single Trip
single_trip.description: Once you step outside the truck, you cannot go back in (only for one round).

forgotten_item.name: Forgotten Item
forgotten_item.description: You've forgotten to restock on a random item, you'll have to work without it.

shy_ghost.name: Shy Ghost
shy_ghost.description: The ghost will share one less evidence, it really doesn't want to be found.

athletic_ghost.name: Athletic Ghost
athletic_ghost.description: The ghost seems to have been an athlete, it's 25% faster !

untrained_hunters.name: Untrained Hunters
untrained_hunters.description: You were told to go to the gym, you've lost 25% sprint capacity!

blackout.name: Blackout
blackout.description: The country is in a total blackout, you can't use the lights in the house.

lower_tier_items.name: Lower Tier Items
lower_tier_items.description: You have to remove a tier level from your gear.

random_map.name: Random Map
random_map.description: Your driver has decided to drive where the dice tells him to go to.

insane_hunters.name: Insane Hunters
insane_hunters.description: You didn't attend therapy, start with less sanity.

dodgy_medicine.name: Dodgy Medicine
dodgy_medicine.description: Seems like you were scammed, your medication doesn't help you anymore.

sole_copy.name: Sole Copy
sole_copy.description: There was only one copy of each item left, you'll have to share it (excl. torches & lighters).

suspicious_contractors.name: Suspicious Contractors
suspicious_contractors.description: Your contractor wants visual evidence of the ghost (handheld video/photo).

no_hiding.name: Claustrophobia
no_hiding.description: The ghost hates open spaces. Hiding places are reduced to zero.

restless_spirit.name: Restless Spirit
restless_spirit.description: The ghost changes its favorite room frequently (High frequency).

no_sanity_monitor.name: Blind Investigation
no_sanity_monitor.description: The Sanity Monitor in the van is disabled. You'll have to guess how much time you have left.

no_activity_monitor.name: Radio Silence
no_activity_monitor.description: The Activity Monitor is broken. You won't be able to see the ghost's activity levels from the van.
